mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_remind ( gmt_create, gmt_modify, service_order_id, remind_date, state) VALUES ( now(), now(), #{serviceOrderId}, #{remindDate}, "ENABLED");
mapper.select: SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, gmt_modify AS gmtModify, service_order_id AS serviceOrderId, remind_date AS remindDate, state FROM b_remind WHERE remind_date < #{date} AND state = "ENABLED" ORDER BY remind_date DESC;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM b_remind WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER};
DELETE FROM b_remind WHERE service_order_id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER};
